content:
I've compiled a small list of files that crash rustc if compiled with -Zincremental-verify-ich=yes -Cincremental=..:

./compiler/rustc_codegen_cranelift/example/std_example.rs
./src/test/ui/const-generics/const_evaluatable_checked/infer-too-generic.rs
./src/test/ui/const-generics/const_evaluatable_checked/object-safety-ok.rs
./src/test/ui/pattern/usefulness/slice-pattern-const.rs
./library/stdarch/crates/core_arch/src/lib.rs

though it seems that all of the stracktraces are already present in the issue tracker in some way so I didn't create any new tickets.
